title: As a BOC User, I want to View the Tender Sheet for an Org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the BOC user logs in
AND navigates to Central Tender Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks an Org's Status in the Central Tender Widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will load the Central Tender Utility displaying the Org's Tender Sheet
AND The form will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND The sheet displayed will be for Tender Year selected on the Central Tender Widget

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a Club User, I want to View the Tender Sheet for my Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Central Tender under Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN user will be directed to Central Tender Utility
AND The tender utility will default to their Club and the current Tender Year
AND The form will match the provided wireframe and data discovery

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a User, I want to Edit the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on EDIT
custom_expected:
THEN system will reload the form in edit mode
AND the form will match the provided wireframe and data discovery

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a BOC User, I want to Delete a Player from the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the EDIT button
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a delete icon on each player's row
AND Clicking the delete icon will remove the player from the tender list
AND If the user saves their updates, the Utility will reload in view mode and the player will not appear in the list
AND If the user cancels their updates, the Utility will reload in view mode and the player will return to the list
AND This can be done at any time, even after freezing the list

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a User, I want to Update a player's Salary Info through the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN users clicks on  Salary Info button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN system will open the player's Salary Info modal in edit mode
AND the editable fields will match the provided data discovery and wire
AND Clicking the Ok button or the 'X' will close the modal and retain the changes made to the modal
AND Clicking 'Cancel' will close the modal and discard the changes made to the modal

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a User, I want to Save updates made to the Salary Info modal on the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN users opens the Salary Info modal in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Okay button and an 'X' icon
AND When either one is the clicked, the modal will close, retaining any changes made
AND When the modal is closed, the Utility will still be in edit mode
AND There will be a Save button on the Utility
AND Clicking Save will save all changes, including those made to the Modal, and reload the utility in View mode
AND There will be a Cancel button on the Utility
AND Clicking Cancel will cancel all changes, including those made to the Modal, and reload the utility in View mode

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a User, I want to switch between different player's Salary Info modals on the Central Tender
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN users opens the Salary Info modal in View/Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Previous button and a Next button
AND Clicking the Previous button will refresh the Modal with the salary info of the previous player appearing in the utility
AND Clicking the Next button will refresh the modal with the salary info of the next player appearing in the utility
AND If any data had been entered, it will be retained when the player is switched 

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a BOC User, I want to Freeze the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to Freeze the tender list
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Freeze button either on Central Tender Widget and the Central Tender Utility
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the Freeze button will freeze the Central Tender Utility to all Club users and prevent them from making and saving any updates
AND If a club user started to make changes before the central tender year was frozen, and tries to save after it has been marked as frozen, they will get an error message indicating that their changes were not saved and to contact the LRD.
  -- Body: "The Central Tender Utility has been frozen and your changes will not be saved.  Please contact a member of the Labor Relations Department."
  --  Button: Ok
AND Clicking Ok will reload the Utility in View Mode
AND If a club user loads the screen while the central tender year is frozen, it will be indicated on the screen with an appropriate message, and the screen will be read-only

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget

title: As a User, I want to Add a Player to the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks EDIT button
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an 'Add Player' button (btn-sm) on the page, as depicted in the attached wire
AND Clicking the 'Add Player' button will add a new row to the bottom of the utility
AND The table will auto scroll to the newly added row
AND The Player column of the new row will be an autocomplete search that mimics the Arbitration Utility player search functionality (both in display and population)
AND This can be done at any time, even after the results are marked final

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a Club User, I want to be prevented from viewing other Clubs' Tender Sheets until after the Tender Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user logs in
AND current date is before Major League Tender Date on System Dates screen
custom_steps: WHEN Club tries to view other Clubs' Tender Sheets
custom_expected:
THEN Club User's will not be allowed to view other Clubs' Tender Sheets until after the Tender Date (system date)
AND If a Club User attempts to view another Clubs' tender sheet prior to the current tender year's tender date, They will be given the following blocking message:
  -- Body: "You may not load another club's worksheet until after the Tender Date."
  -- Button: Ok
AND Clicking Ok will close the message and return the user to the Utility
BUT if current date is on or After Major League Tender Date, club user should be able to see other clubs tender sheets

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: Rule to Prevent Saving the Central Tender Utility with Blank Rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in Edit mode
AND user Clicked on the Add Player button to add a row
custom_steps: WHEN user clicked on save leaving the new row blank
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a rule check
AND an error message should prevent user from saving the utility

title: As a User, I want  clicking Cancel to trigger a confirmation Modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in Edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN system will trigger the "Are you sure modal"
AND Clicking yes cancels changes and toggles the form back to view mode
AND Clicking no dismisses the modal and the form remains in edit mode

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a User, I want to Submit Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in View/Edit mode
AND Central Tender Utility is in Preliminary State
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Submit button
custom_expected:
THEN system will update the following fields on both the Central Tender Utility and the Central Tender Widget
  -- Status
  -- Submitted
  -- Submitted By
AND If in edit mode, the form will refresh in View Mode

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a BOC User, I want to Verify the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is in Central Tender Utility in View/Edit mode
AND Central Tender Utility is in Submitted State
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Verify button
custom_expected:
THEN system will update the following fields on both the Central Tender Utility and the Central Tender Widget
  -- Status
  -- Verified
  -- Verified By
AND If in edit mode, the form will refresh in View Mode

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a Club User, I want to Edit a Tender Sheet that is in Submitted or Verified State
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user opens a tender sheet in Submitted or Verified State
custom_steps:
WHEN user Edits the Tender Sheet
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN system will be given the following warning message:
  -- Body:  "You may not edit the Tender Utility while it is Submitted or Verified state.  If you continue, the Tender Sheet will be un-submitted and returned to Preliminary state.  Would you like to continue?
 -- Buttons: Yes, No
AND If the user selects Yes, their changes are committed and the following fields are updated on both the Central Tender Utility and the Central Tender Widget
  -- Status
  -- Verified
  -- Verified By
Or If they select No, the warning is closed.

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: Update Arbitration Logic to Handle Non-Tenders
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is displayed on the arb eligibles utility
custom_steps: WHEN player has an "EFA (XXA2C) - Non Tender" transaction approved for him
custom_expected:
THEN if the utility has been finalized for the given year his arb status should be updated on the utility to 'Non - Tendered'
BUT if the utility has NOT been finalized for the given year the player should be removed from the utility

title: As a BOC User, I want to Navigate to and View the Central Tender Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Central Tender under Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Central Tender Widget should load
AND "Central Tender" tab should be placed in alphabetical order (except for Award Bonus Packages, which is listed last) on the dashboard and submenu of Major Contracts
AND Browser tab text should say "Central Tender" 
AND layout should match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Default Sort is Alpha on Org
AND Status column will be a hyperlink to the Org's Tender Sheet

NOTE: The Central Tender Widget is a BOC only widget.
Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget

title: As a User, I want to View the Salary Info Modal for a Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Salary Info button
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch the Salary Info Modal
AND The layout of the modal will match the provided wireframe
AND The fields will match the provided data discovery
AND If the Tender Utility is in view mode when the modal is opened, the modal will be in view mode
AND If the Tender Utility is in edit mode when the modal is opened, the modal will be in edit mode
AND Clicking the Close button or the 'X' will close the modal
Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a User, I want the salary info modal to default to the correct values
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Salary info modal defaults to correct values
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on Salary info modal
custom_expected:
THEN the defaults should be as follows (PY = Platform Year):
(PY) 1st MJ Contract Checkbox: Checked if player has no MJC or first MJC starts in PY
(PY) MJ Tender Amount: (PY) MJ min tender amount
(PY) MJ Min Tender Amount: see story on min tender amt calcs
(PY) Para 2 Tender Amount: (PY) MN min tender amount
(PY) Para 2 Min Tender Amount: see story on min tender amt calcs
Repeat (PY-1) Bonuses: unchecked
(PY-1) MJ Salary: MJC Base salary in PY-1 plus pro-rated signing bonus
(PY-1) MN Para 2 Salary: Split salary in MJC (if entered)
(PY-1) Earnings Excl Bonuses: Sum of dollars earned as calculated on LRD Payroll impact on payroll tab for PY-1, excluding the bonuses bucket
(PY-1) Total Potential Bonuses: Total offered bonuses in PY-1
Additional Comp in (PY-1) contract: checked if LRD Payroll impact for MJC has >0 amount in the "non-cash comp" bucket
(PY-2) MJ Salary: MJC Base salary in PY-2 plus pro-rated signing bonus
(PY-2) Earnings Excl Bonuses: Sum of dollars earned as calculated on LRD Payroll impact on payroll tab for PY-2, excluding the bonuses bucket

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a user I want to sort the Central Tender Utility in view mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is viewing the Central Tender Utility in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on any table header on the utility
custom_expected:
THEN system should sort the column ASC / DESC
AND add the red sort icon (icon should follow global layout)

title: As a BOC User, I want to run the Tender Listing Report from the Central Tender Widget
custom_preconds:
Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Tender+Listing+Report+Layout
Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Tender+Listing+Report+Details
Grouping, Population, Logic, and Sorting: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=118463040
Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Tender+Listing+Report+Prompts
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Central Tender Widget
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a Print button
AND the print button should also contain a custom League Filter with the following options:
   -- All Leagues [Default]
   -- American League
   -- National League
AND clicking Print should run the Tender Listing Report for the League specified in the prompt and the Tender Year chosen in the Widget's header filter

title: As a User, I want to Print the Tender Utility for a specific club
custom_preconds:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Tender+Listing+Report+Layout
Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Tender+Listing+Report+Details
Grouping, Population, Logic, and Sorting: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=118463040
Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Tender+Listing+Report+Prompts
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in with permissions for the CT utility
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Central Tender Utility for a club
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a print button
AND the print button should export the utility to PDF in a new tab
AND this export will be auto-filtered to only show data for the Club that the button was pressed on

title: As a BOC User, I want to see a Refresh Roster Button on the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND user has navigated to the tender sheet of an org by clicking on the org in the CT Utility
AND the org's tender sheet is in a Preliminary, Submitted, or verified State
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user views the Tender Sheet
custom_expected:
THEN users should see a Refresh Roster button on the Clubs' tender sheet
AND clicking the button should launch a confirmation modal as follows:
  -- **Body:** "Are you sure you want to refresh the roster?"
  -- **Buttons:** OK, Cancel
AND clicking OK should refresh the tender sheet and return updated rosters that reflect any roster moves that have been made since the tender sheet was snapshot
BUT clicking Cancel should dismiss the modal

title: As a Club User, I want to see a Refresh Roster Button on the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user is logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND user has navigated to the tender sheet for their org from the left nav
AND the org's tender sheet is in a Preliminary state
custom_steps: WHEN Club user views the Tender Sheet
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Refresh Roster button on the tender sheet
AND clicking the button should launch a confirmation modal as follows:
  -- **Body:** "Are you sure you want to refresh the roster?"
  -- **Buttons:** OK, Cancel
AND clicking OK should refresh the tender sheet and return updated rosters that reflect any roster moves that have been made since the tender sheet was snapshot
BUT clicking Cancel should dismiss the modal
AND if club's tender sheet is in a submitted or verified state then the refresh button should not display for club user

title: As a BOC User, I want to Tender Transactions Created when I click Finalize button on the Central Tender Widget
custom_preconds:
*****New Functionality*****

***Pressing the button should kick off a batch, we were unable to test this because of when it was delivered.***
***See https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21300 for additional info, please update the test case to account for this.***

GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND navigates to Central Tender Widget 
AND all the tender list are in the status of "Verified"
AND the utility is frozen
custom_steps: WHEN clicks on the Finalize button on the Central Tender Widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will generate Tender Transactions for all players with a Tender status of "Tendered"
AND No transactions will be created for Non-Tendered or Signed players
AND The newly created transactions will appear in the players' histories
AND The transactions won't be clickable/openable
AND Clicking the Finalize button will launch an "Are you sure message"
  -- Body: "This will create tender transactions for all tendered players.  Are you sure you want to continue?"
  -- Buttons: Continue, Back
AND Clicking Continue will launch a blue notification "Transactions being created"
AND The Tender Process can only be finalized once for a given year
AND After the Finalize has been clicked it should be removed from the screen

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Central+Tender+Widget

title: As a User, I want the tender amounts set to the MJ Minimum if the 1st MJ Contract box is checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND user has navigated to the tender sheet of an org by clicking on the org in the CT Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing Salary info Modal for a Player who's 1st MJ Contract checkbox is checked
custom_expected:
THEN the "MJ Tender Amount" for the Tender Year will default to the minimum
AND If the 1st MJ Contract checkbox is checked, "Para. 2 Amount" for the Tender Year will default to the minimum
AND All salary information for years prior to the Tender Year will be blanked out and in-editable

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Salary+Info+Modal

title: As a User, I want to Non-Tendered players to stand out on the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND user has navigated to the tender sheet of an org by clicking on the org in the CT Utility
AND the org has player with 'Non-Tendered' status
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a player who has a tender status of "Non-Tendered on tender list
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Red Exclamation Icon next to their name, as depicted in the provided wire.
AND The icon will be visible in both edit and view mode
AND If the player's status is changed from non-tendered, the icon will disappear

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Central+Tender+Utility

custom_expected:

title: Central Tender Utility Permissions - Club MJ Contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club Admin or Club Basic user logs in with Central Tender Utility Permissions
AND navigate to Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN Club Admin and Club Basic user attempt to view Central Tender Utility
custom_expected:
THEN Club Admin user should able to view Central Tender for all org for previous years, but only after the tender date for the current year
AND should be able Update and Submit Central Tender for the login org for the current year, before the tender date
BUT should not be able to make any update for other org 
AND Club Basic user should be able to view Central Tender for all org for previous years, but only after the tender date for the current year
BUT should not be able to make any update 

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Central+Tender+Utility

title: As a User, I want the minimum tender amounts to recalculate when data is changed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND user has navigated to the tender sheet of an org by clicking on the org in the CT Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user changes the data in the Salary info Modal for a player (any checkbox or numerical value is updated)
custom_expected:
THEN Salary Info modal should recalculate minimum tender amounts 
MN Minimum Tender Amount:
1. Start by determining the min MN salary for the player based on if they have MLS (using the two MN minimum system dates)
2. If first MJ contract is checked, use salary from 1
3. ELSE If current MN salary is less than the major league minimum, use max of:
        -current MN salary * max MN salary cut
        -current earnings * max MN salary cut
        -salary from 1
4. ELSE If current MN salary is > 0, use max of:
       -current MN salary * max MN salary cut
        -salary from 1
5. ELSE take max of:
       -current MJ salary * max MN salary cut
       - -salary from 1

MJ Minimum Tender Amount:
 Max of:
		-next mn tender amount
		-previous salary * max MJ salary cut from last year
		-current salary (plus bonuses if applicable) * max MJ salary cut from this year
		-MJ minimum salary

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Salary+Info+Modal

title: As a User, I want all Tendered players to have tender amounts entered when I submit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC logged in with permissions for Central Tender
AND user has navigated to the tender sheet of an org by clicking on the org in the CT Utility


Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Central+Tender+Utility
custom_steps: WHEN a User clicks the Submit button
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a rule to check to confirm tender amounts are entered for all players with a Tender Status of Tendered
AND If the check fails:
  -- Club Users will receive a hard error
  -- BOC Users will receive a soft error that can be overridden
  -- Body: "There are one or more players with missing tender amounts."
  --  Button: Back, Override (BOC Only)

title: Central Tender Utility Permissions - BOC MJ Contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC  Admin and BOC Basic logs in with Central Tender Utility Permissions
AND navigate to Central Tender Utility

http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Central+Tender+Utility
custom_steps: WHEN BOC Admin and BOC Basic user attempt to view Central Tender Utility
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Admin user should able to view Central Tender for all org
AND should be able to Update, Submit, Verify, Freeze, and Finalize for all org
AND BOC Basic user should be able to view Central Tender for all org 
BUT should not be able to make any update

title: Ensure that earnings listed on the utility are rounded correctly for players that have MN and MJ service time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player exists with an approved MJC with MJ and MN league compensation who has service days at both the MJ and MN level in a season (2017 MJC example Joey Wendle(ID: 373465)
AND player is included in CT utility population
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to CT utility and views salary info modal for the player
custom_expected:
THEN PY-1 Earnings Excl Bonuses and PY-2 Earnings Excl Bonuses will be rounded correctly based on the following:
(salary * days at level / days in season)
Example: Wendle's 2017 Earnings based on the calc above were $221,784.699 so the Utility should display $221,785 for his earnings

title: As a User, I want to see a Refresh Roster Button on the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to view transactions that have occurred after the Tender Sheets have been snapshot
custom_steps:
WHEN user is on clubs tender sheet
AND when user clicks on "Refresh Roster" button
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Admin Users will see a "Refresh Roster" button on the clubs tender sheet in each of three states (Preliminary, Submitted, and Verified)
AND Club Admin Users will see a "Refresh Roster" button on their own tender sheet ONLY when it is in Preliminary state
THEN confirmation modal will launch"
-- Body: "Are you sure you want to refresh the roster?"
-- Buttons: OK, Cancel
Clicking OK will refresh the tender sheet and return updated rosters that reflect any roster moves that have been made since the tender sheet was snapshot
AND Clicking Cancel will dismiss the modal
